attributes.action: Honour Henry Allingham with a Knighthood in accordance with his status and past record
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Henry Allingham, now officially Britains oldest man and Britains oldest survivor of WW1 surely merits the Honour of Knight for his status and outstanding record of service to country and community,  both military and public. In the light of past Honours given, there can be no other person in this day and age that merits the Honour more. This should be done with all speed before it is 'too late.'

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
